name: WorkoutPlanner
0:
”Alexa, open Workout Planner”
”Start workout plan”
”Add 10 reps of bench press using 135 pounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: workout planner
des:
Alexa can help you maximize your workouts by laying out a play before you head to the gym. To get started, just say "Start Workout" and Alexa will walk you through detailed questions on what exercises you plan to do. A complete list of exercises can be found by saying "list all exercises" or be more specific with something like "what exercises can I do for my arms". If you're not familiar with a given exercise, just say something like "Explain bench press".

As you build your workout, each exercise will show up in as a "list" similar to a shopping list in the Alexa Companion App. You can bring this with you to the gym, and check off each exercise while you're doing it.

Exercises Supported:
- Sit-ups, Push-ups, Twist Abs, Incline Sit-ups, Barbell Deadlift, Barbell Squat
- Bench Press, Dumbbell Press, Shoulder Press, Preacher Curl, Dumbbell Hammer Curl, Cable Pushdown
- Lat Pull-downs, Seated Row
- Calf Raise, Leg Extension, Leg Curl
